column5: Charming historic cottage with 2 beds & 1.5 bath.   Sleeps 6 comfortably.   Property features: Traeger grill, kayaks, fishing & swimming.   Washer & Dryer on property.   Great local restaurants, wine tasting, antique shops, boutiques all within walking distance.   Come relax by the river!
column8: The Loop River Lodge A - Sleeps 6
